parameters.name: restApiId
parameters.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

parameters.name: documentationVersion
parameters.description: The version identifier of the to-be-retrieved documentation snapshot.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version identifier of the API documentation snapshot.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date when the API documentation snapshot is created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the API documentation snapshot.
